text: @Oprah @staceyabrams The COVID19 pandemic exposed the three 3 types of American pandemics protesting on its streets #1 Racial Pademic ie Black Lives Matter #2. Sexists Pandemic ie #MeToo #3. Classist Pandemic ie The Poor Peoples Movement w/Rev Barber...
